Detailed Description

A Cardinal spline is an instance of the Hermite spline. Using a Cardinal spline, you got the possibility to set the strength of the tangents. If you want the tangent to be automatically generated you should use the CatmullRom spline instead.
Author:
Joachim Klahr
Version:
0.1
Date:
2006
